full width image.

As the era of “Big Data” dawns on biomedical research, data are being generated on alargescale challenging our current abilities for data representation, visualization, integration, storage, and analysis. It will be increasingly common for patients to have their genomic data become part of their electronic health records (EHRs), and we can expect streams of data from sensors and social networks to become increasingly relevant in patient care.

Become a student researcher today!

Apply Today

Applications will open in October.

Internships start in Summer 2018.

What a student can expect

  • Year-long paid training in Biomedical Big Data
  • Hands-on training sessions at City Tech
  • Summer bootcamp at Cornell
  • Internships at Cornell
  • Journal Club events
  • Annual student symposium on Biomedical Big Data at City Tech
